thread.section_title: Born to Move Moving Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Born to Move Moving Company | goborntomove.com
thread.title: Joel, Boston MA
thread.title_full: Born to Move Moving Company reviewed by Joel, Boston MA

author: Joel, Boston MA
title: Joel, Boston MA
text:
These guys were awesome. Moved everything from my 6th floor apartment even though our elevator was broken. I just called them the day before when I found out the elevator was going to be broken and they had me hire one more mover. No problem. I couldn't have done it without them. By the way, not one thing was broken or scratched.
They are priced fairly and although it is possible you may find someone a little cheaper, but these guys are by far the best VALUE. A good and fair price and a great product. I even reviewed their contract and insurance. Very good.
